caption.p: Interquartile ranges of area-weighted cumulative wildfire emissions of carbon dioxide (CO 2), carbon monoxide (CO), methane (CH 4), submicron aerosols (PM1), and organic aerosols (OA) for the entire mountain range.

table-wrap-foot.p: The dynamic simulations include decadal re-estimated area burned distributions that account for prior fire events and projected climate. The static simulations include area burned distributions estimated only on projected climate.
